document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Came </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">buy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">smile </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">today </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">single </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">smile </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">smallest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">your </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">face </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">suit </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">well </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">else </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">miss </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">shone </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">very </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">small </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I'm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">pleading </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">"counter" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">Sir </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">afford </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">sell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I've </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Diamonds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">fingers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">You </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">what </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0"> </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Diamonds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I've </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Rubies </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Evening </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Blood </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Topaz </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">star! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">'Twould </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Bargain" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Jew </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Say </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">May </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">Sir? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: I came to buy a smile today
